item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 20, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Spice86 – A PC emulator for real mode reverse engineering (73 points | 11 comments)

3. Launch HN: Confident AI (YC W25) – Open-source evaluation framework for LLM apps (29 points | discuss)

9. Do ambiguous images provide psychological insights? Testing a popular claim (5 points | 3 comments)

14. Softmax forever, or why I like softmax (154 points | 61 comments)

20. All-optical control of charge-trapping defects in rare-earth doped oxides (23 points | 2 comments)

22. Animate Anyone 2: High-Fidelity Character Image Animation (120 points | 31 comments)
23. The 8-Bit Era's Weird Uncle: The TI-99/4A (144 points | 90 comments)

25. Agent-Less System Monitoring with Elixir Broadway (65 points | 16 comments)

28. The Forecasting Company (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
